data_table.description: MESA Ancillary Study Dataset: MESA Classic ApoE isoforms.

variable.name: apoea11
variable.value: E2: Allele denotes isoform 112Cys/158Cys of the mature protein
E3: Allele denotes isoform 112Cys/158Arg of the mature protein
E4: Allele denotes isoform 112Arg/158Arg of the mature protein

variable.name: apoea21
variable.value: E2: Allele denotes isoform 112Cys/158Cys of the mature protein
E3: Allele denotes isoform 112Cys/158Arg of the mature protein
E4: Allele denotes isoform 112Arg/158Arg of the mature protein
